ComicInfo.Characters: Phoenix [Jean Grey] (zombie,James Howlett] (zombie),Spider-Man [Peter Parker] (zombie),K'Shamba,Firelord [Pyreus Kril] (zombie,Hawkeye [Clint Barton] (zombie,Forge,destroyed),zombie),Giant-Man [Hank Pym] (zombie),Colonel America (Cap's brain in T'Channa's body,Luke Cage (zombie),Reynolds (dies),Bruce Banner [Hulk] (zombie,Wasp [Janet Van Dyne] (zombie),The Acolytes,Wolverine [Logan,Iron Man [Tony Stark] (zombie,Malcolm,Black Panther [T'Challa] (zombie)

ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T15:32:25 [Issue ID 4000-124225] urn:comicvine:4000-124225 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 18:44:03. [Issue ID 382537]
ComicInfo.Summary:
This is it, the brain-eating, limb-wrenching climax to the sinister sequel of the runaway hit series! The fate of what's left of the human race hangs in the balance as the Civil War between the Marvel Zombies comes to its shattering—and sickening—conclusion!
Is this the end?
Notes:
The cover is a homage of the cover of The Silver Surfer #4.
ComicInfo.Title: Part 5 of 5
